item.title: Russian strike on Ukraine's Kyiv leaves 1,330 buildings still without heat, mayor says - Reuters
item.description: Russian strike on Ukraine’s Kyiv leaves 1,330 buildings still without heat, mayor says ReutersRussia-Ukraine war: List of key events, day 1,431 Al Jazeera‘We have to keep people warm’: The Ukrainian energy workers risking their lives as Russia targets critical facilities CNNKyiv is freezing in the dark as Russian strikes leave Ukraine’s capital powerless NBC NewsRussian strikes knock out heat in freezing Kyiv as peace talks continue NPR
